lead_paragraph: An article on Friday about the surging Tampa Bay Rays misstated the given name of the reliever who recorded his first career save in a 14-inning victory against the Boston Red Sox and it misstated the final score of the game. He is Jason Hammel, not Josh, and the Rays won 4-2, not 4-1.
